mapper.sql: pid, valid_starttime, carbrand, valid_endtime, maxpeople, luggage, price, prepay, hour_cnt, car_img, del_flg, order_num, ctdt, ctuser, updt, upuser,id
mapper.select:
select
from traffic_chartered_price
del_flg=0
and carbrand like "%"#{carbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by order_num
limit #{offset},#{limit};

select count(*) from traffic_chartered_price
del_flg=0
and carbrand like "%"#{carbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update:
update traffic_chartered_price
valid_endtime = #{validEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maxpeople = #{maxpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
luggage = #{luggage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prepay = #{prepay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
hour_cnt = #{hourCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_img = #{carImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctdt = #{ctdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ctuser = #{ctuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updt = #{updt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upuser = #{upuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and valid_starttime = #{validStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and carbrand = #{carbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update traffic_chartered_price set valid_endtime = #{validEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maxpeople = #{maxpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, luggage = #{luggage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prepay = #{prepay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hour_cnt = #{hourCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_img = #{carImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctdt = #{ctdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ctuser = #{ctuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updt = #{updt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upuser = #{upuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and valid_starttime = #{validStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and carbrand = #{carbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from traffic_chartered_price t
t.del_flg=0 AND (case when t.valid_endtime >= t.valid_starttime then (#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN t.valid_starttime AND t.valid_endtime) ELSE ((#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN t.valid_starttime and '24:00') or (#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN '00:00' and t.valid_endtime)) END )= TRUE
and t.pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by order_num
